StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.name: [GetSMCRReserveUnitByID]
StoredProcedureSqlServerv2k5.body:
@SMCRReserveUnitID uniqueiden..er
AS SET NOCOUNT ON
SET TRANSACTION ISOLATION LEVEL READ UNCOMMITTED
SELECT
sr.[SMCRReserveUnitID], sr.Organiza.onID AS Organiza.onID, 0 As SchoolCode, sr.FiscalYear AS FiscalYear, [ContractType], [SMCRReserveUnitName] As SMCRReserveUnitName, [E1ThruE5Popula.on], sr.[Street1] AS SMCRStreet1, sr.[Street2] AS SMCRStreet2, sr.[City] AS SMCRCity, sr.[State] AS SMCRState, sr.[ZipCode] AS SMCRZipCode,
sr.[Remarks], sr.NumVisitsPlanned, sr.ContractGoal as NumContractGoal,
sr.PointOfContactID FROM [MCRISS].[USMC].[SMCRReserveUnit] sr
WHERE sr.SMCRReserveUnitID = @SMCRReserveUnitID
--- CLEAN UP SET NOCOUNT OFF
